title: After recent buffs, Miss Fortune has some of the most impressive statistics

embed.description: LoL Statistics, Builds, Runes, Masteries, Skill Orders, Counters and Matchups for Miss Fortune when played ADC. Statistics include Miss Fortune's Win Rate, Play Rate and Ban Rate. Counters include who Miss Fortune ADC is Strong or Weak Against.

body:
I don't understand why people consider Miss Fortune unviable or a trash-tier-ADC. She's been long considered one of the worst ADCs in the game after her nerfs a few years ago when she used to be considered one of the best ADCs if not the best and she was even hilariously overpowered on her release. After a small buff to her ultimate, she has some of the most impressive stats for all ADCs.
---

After recent buffs, which only effected the AD ratio on Miss Fortune's ultimate:

* She has one of the highest win rates in the game (52.31%)
* She has one of the highest damage outputs in the game (24,963)
* She has one of the highest pentakill averages (15th - 30th/all champs)

This isn't because ONLY Miss Fortune mains play her, she has a fair pick rate (5.49%)

_(sources from champion.gg_)

---

I'm very curious as to why I constantly hear people call out Miss Fortune for being "unviable", "trash-tier", "useless", etc. I never really understood why as the moment I started playing Miss Fortune I always just assumed she was balanced and a good pick.

As far as standard adc picks go:

She outranges Graves, Lucian, Sivir, and Jinx. She ties with Kalista, Vayne, and Trist.

-Sivir can out-burst with an auto-reset
-Graves and Lucian are both casters, so they naturally burst her easy
-Jinx can just flip on her range and automatically out-range her, or just flip on her attack speed and quickly out-dps her

-Kalista can't be caught period
-Vayne out-duels anyone period
-Trist gradually out-ranges her by a mile and has a HUGE AA steroid + burst damage combo against her with her E and Q

MF's kit just doesn't get enough done. MF's main advantage is...roaming...and as much as it's "neat", it doesn't add enough to her bland, vanilla kit. There's not enough power in the right spots, nor does her kit have much synergy with itself, so she's stuck auto-attacking without much else to do that defines her as a champ. After leaving lane, Q becomes near worthless, and only amps the issue.

I find it odd when you say Miss Fortune's doesn't offer much besides roaming. Not only does she have one of the highest damage outputs for ADCs in general, but also one of the highest damage outputting champions in the game. On top of that she has mixed damage so even when she's behind she still can do more damage than others like Caitlyn or Draven who are almost if not totally physical damage based and extremely easy to itemize against.

I also find it odd you say all of these ADCs are stronger than her, she actually counters all of them, or at least for majority of the game. Miss Fortune's early game damage is by far the highest of all ADCs, with her Q doing damage and being an auto attack reset, her W passive giving her pretty much a free extra 40 AD, and her ultimate is absolutely devestating early game. There's no real way to outdamage a good Miss Fortune early.

Miss Fortune has a lot of strengths like her high damage output, poking ability, dueling ability, and teamfighting ability that ADCs don't have. She works well with any and against any team comp unlike a lot of ADCs (Kog'maw for example), and most ADCs aren't nearly as versatile as her. The only thing Miss Fortune can't do is be a hypercarry late game, and while she doesn't do everything the best of all ADCs, she still can do it unlike most ADCs.

Main issues I see is confusion on how her kit works, not actually knowing how to play her properly, and thinking her only use is her ult (which simply isn't true at all.)

Her kit was confusing for scalings: People kept assuming her ult did not scale at all off AD, when in fact it does. She has an AD scaling on her Q and W's passive stacking damage, and her ult scales off AD by applying stacks of W (adding stacks and applying damage for each stack). Now her ult scales off AD twice: once off total AD (Impure Shots stacking) and bonus AD ("base" physical damage.) It did more damage if they had stacks to begin with. (And basically what you said: People assume mixed damage is a bad thing since you can't itemize penetration for both easily, even though it's actually very strong early-mid where they aren't able to itemize for both defenses easily.)

People assume her only use was her ult and that's it. The reality is she's a very strong early-mid game champion: She's a very strong Lane Bully, is able to fight tanks early on thanks to mixed damage, has some good dueling potential, and is one of the best champions capable of getting kills early on. Her rework (from years ago) moved focus from her ult as damage to auto-attacking as a major source of damage (which isn't a bad thing.) People also skipped over her because she isn't a hyper carry late game, and while there is some truth to it, she makes up for it (again) by having a very strong early-mid game, and even late game when she does fall off, she doesn't fall off hard enough to no longer be a threat you can ignore (Left alone, she will still ruin your day.)

I'm a moderate on MF at the moment.  Is she bad?  In a way, yes.  Is she as bad as the boards make her out to be?  Not even close.

Did the buffs help?  For me, yes, because I built MF with raw damage, stacking as much AD as possible, so now my ult does just insane damage.  However, it still doesn't solve her core issues.  Both of her passives are still afterthoughts, and she still lacks a specific niche.  These things I think will be solved (hopefully) by preseason 6.

FWIW, she's one of my 3 favorite ADCs.  I think that ult buff she just got was all she needed.

I think her only "issue" is that she's an early game bully and not one of those late game hypercarries that some people love.  I think we don't want every adc to be a hypercarry.  The only other two knocks against her is that she does a bit of magic damage but can't built mpen and she doesn't scale with crits, just AD and AS.
